Description:
Required Skills to be successful:1.- Managerial and team management experience.2.- Relationship management.3.- Negotiation skills.4.- Experience with sales tools.About the Team:Reporting to the Area B2B Manager and will work closely with the B2B sales team and internal and external stakeholders.What equips you for the role:Bachelor’s Degree.
8 – 10 years’ experience B2B automotive industry, including knowledge of the different sectors and the needs and challenges faced by SMEs.
Experience with managing and leading a team.
Experience with managing increase volume and managing collections.
Experience with managing model wise target.
Valid UAE drivers license. Job Details
